scene_description_enriched: A haloed figure, likely a saint, stands holding a golden chalice. The figure is dressed in a deep purple robe over a blue garment, with a green sash. The background depicts an architectural setting with two large columns, one blue and one brown, supporting an unseen structure. Between the columns are windows with diamond-shaped tracery and a blue curtain with gold ornamentation. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard pattern of gold and beige. The upper part of the scene features a blue sky with gold stars.
